section.title: File Type - Airspace
section.p: XCSoar supports airspace files using a sub set of the widely distributed OpenAir format. Files are available from the Special Use Airspace section of the Soaring Server:
TODO: As per waypoints - point to a common place for updates \verb|http://acro.harvard.edu/SOARING/JL/SUA|

The following are the list of supported airspace types. All other airspace types will be drawn as type "Other": Class A, Class B, Class C, Class D, Class E, Class F, Prohibited areas, Danger areas, Restricted Areas, CTR, No Gliders, Wave, Other.
